name: Snake Game (sharp accent)
description:
This is the game build on my tutorial series which you can find here

 https://sharpaccent.com/?c=course&id=31

Check out the other courses I have as well 

https://sharpaccent.com/

Game info:

WASD / Arrow Keys  to move

Eat as many red dots as you can, don't hit the walls or your tail

Enjoy :D

p.s. Donations are appreciated, everything goes back into making more tutorials
